name: NoEscape (MuffinCrumbs09)
description:
TW - Suicide

NOTE: This game is more of a mechanic show off than an ACTUAL game and most elements probably won't make sense

No escape is a puzzle game with DARK themes. This game should only take the average player 5 - 10 minutes to complete. You have signed your life away to testing, but something doesn't seem right. You suspect the scientists John and Dickson are lying to you, until one day. John has had enough of this cruel human testing and decides to help you escape... Will you make it?

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint

LControl - Crouch

LMB - Trigger (Torch and Gun)

E - Interact (Notes, Picking stuff up, Unlock safes)

R - Restart level if stuck

This game was my submissions for the 2022 GameDev.tv GameJam with the theme of: Death is just the beginning

All of my development has/will be put on my YouTube so make sure you check it out!

All of my code can be found on my GitHub!
